item.title: CLion Catch - Wed Oct 22 10:30:18 UTC 2025
item.description:
This plugin enables Catch 1.x and Catch 2.x test frameworks support in CLion. Catch 2.x modern, C++-native, header-only, test framework for unit-tests, TDD and BDD...
vendor: JetBrains s.r.o. downloads: 5 pricingModel: FREE xmlId: org.jetbrains.plugins.clion.test.catch
